sentences.en: ...all the blood and offal the butchers shove down in the gutters.
sentences.cn: …屠夫们倒入下水道的所有血和杂碎。

sentences.en: Dead breathe I living breathe, tread dead dust, devour a urinous offal from all dead.
sentences.cn: 活人吸着死者呼出来的气, 踏着死者的遗骸, 贪婪地吃着一切死者那尿骚味的内脏.

sentences.en: He was still spewing forth in public such offal about Mary Lincoln.
sentences.cn: 他还在公众场合散布关于玛丽·林肯的这样一些谰言.

sentences.en: Offal is now thought to be very nutritious.
sentences.cn: 现在认为猪牛等的下水很有营养.

sentences.en: Original, a day when he walks, because the shoe is medium, must stop offal pace, cobble.
sentences.cn: 原来, 一天他走路时, 因鞋中有粒石子而不得不停下脚步, 将石子拿出.

sentences.en: Refers to the meat of slaughtered sheep and goats with head, feet , and offal taken away.
sentences.cn: 指当年出栏并已屠宰除去头蹄下水后带骨肉(即胴体重)的重量.

sentences.en: Strong flavor, Chuangsuan, especially cooked seafood, and various animal offal Shangcai longer.
sentences.cn: 味浓厚 、 嗜葱蒜, 尤以烹制海鲜, 汤菜和各种动物内脏为长.

sentences.en: The most nauseous offal fit for the gods ( John Fowles ).
sentences.cn: 最令神们恶心的祭品( 约翰·福尔斯 ).

sentences.en: Uric acid stones are not eating high - purine foods, such as animal offal, seafood.
sentences.cn: 尿酸结石者不宜食高嘌呤食物, 如动物内脏 、 海鲜食品.

sentences.en: While he watches , the heifer is to be burned - its hide, flesh, blood and offal.
sentences.cn: 人要在他眼前把这母牛焚烧.牛的皮, 肉, 血,粪都要焚烧.

words.tran_cn: 内脏；[环境]垃圾；碎屑；工业下脚

trans.tran_en: the inside parts of an animal, for example the heart, liver, and kidneys used as food
